description:
@bujuofficial not all radio people are sheep or the enemy. Some of us deya a use the platform for more than just shake you booty shit
-
Some of us are trying to educate also
-
Now all I am waiting on are two of the smartest artistes I know and have reasoned with @vybzkartel and @grunggaadzilla to join in and preach that this corona crap is a total LIE and trick
-
Who can afford to run can run but what about those who can't? Wake up my people ✊🏾
#coronalies #coronaviruslies #reggae #buju #dancehall
